item.title: By: qlimaxmito
item.dc:creator: qlimaxmito
item.description:
To add to the frustration, you know that such a player will be stealing your tank the second you get out to repair it yourself; same when you need some random passenger to get out and build a vehicle station.
Also at the opposite end of this there are those players who pull out the Fortification Tool and rush to help you, but end up rubbing their nose against your tank with a confused look on their face because they aren't playing as Support.
Meanwhile DICE was all-in working on a 5v5 competitive mode, again.
item.content:encoded:
To add to the frustration, you know that such a player will be stealing your tank the second you get out to repair it yourself; same when you need some random passenger to get out and build a vehicle station.

Also at the opposite end of this there are those players who pull out the Fortification Tool and rush to help you, but end up rubbing their nose against your tank with a confused look on their face because they aren’t playing as Support.

Meanwhile DICE was all-in working on a 5v5 competitive mode, again.
